about_the_game:
This is a monster - besieging - the - city game, which includes real - time strategy, auto - chess, strategy, and card - playing methods. Players can freely build their card decks and actively control the appearance timing of their monster armies to break through the human positions.

Gameplay Introduction:

Drawing / Playing Cards: In each battle, cards will be automatically drawn until the card deck is exhausted. Players consume corresponding magic power to summon cards to enter the battle.

Surviving monsters will continue to the next level of battle, but will not last until the next new battle.

The summoned monsters will fight in the form of auto - chess and are no longer under the player's control.

Breaking through the human castle means victory, and having one's own castle broken through means defeat.

Card Pools and Card Drawing:

Different card pools can draw cards of different races, and the card - drawing prices will also vary.

Card Synthesis:

Consuming at most 5 cards of the same level, there is a certain probability of upgrading the main card to a higher level.

Card Refining:

Consuming 1 or more cards of the same level can make the main card refine its panel attributes or skill levels once. When the synthesis fails, it is also regarded as having carried out one refinement.

Shop:

Players can buy cards or sell unwanted cards.

Challenge Levels:

After passing the ordinary levels, there will be a highly - difficult Long - March mode waiting for players to explore.
